subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: With the 2010 draft, the pressure is back on Giants General Manager Jerry Reese, who has to prove he is adept at not just building a team, but also at repairing one.
snippet: With the 2010 draft, the pressure is back on Giants General Manager Jerry Reese, who has to prove he is adept at not just building a team, but also at repairing one.
